meanings.sent1: The ionogenic substance created a spark when mixed with water.
meanings.sent2: The battery's ionogenic properties allowed it to power the device efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The ionogenic solution was so powerful that it made the lab technician's hair stand on end.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was ionogenic, electrifying the atmosphere wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The ionogenic effect of the storm could be felt in the charged air before the lightning struck.
